metadata.name: "Chance" - the winner of film festivals
metadata.description:
The short animated film "Chance" is the winner of the film festivals in Cannes, Los Angeles and Moscow.
(Cannes Short Film Festival / One-Reeler Short Film Competition / OPEN VISION FILM FEST)
At the moment (March 12, 2022) the film is being submitted to the qualifying round for the Oscars and the Canadian Screen Awards (CSA)

The plot of the film takes place in the distant future, where a spaceship with the remaining people on board drifts across the universe in search of a suitable place to live.
After discovery another planet, a research drone is released to scan the area.
Will the drone be able to find signs of life to awaken Hope and give a chance for a new home?

The credits express gratitude to the people who inspired and who helped in the creation of the cartoon.


The funds will go to the development of young artists.
